component.name: OpenOMF
component.summary: An open-source remake of the DOS fighting game One Must Fall 2097

description.p: OpenOMF is an open-source remake of the DOS fighting classic One Must Fall 2097.
One Must Fall 2097 is a 2D fighting game set in the year 2097 where pilots use Human Assisted Robots (HARs) to battle in various arenas.
One Must Fall 2097 features a 1 player story mode, a 2 player mode, a tournament mode with RPG elements and network play.
